channel.title: Kinnera Internet Sites on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Kinnera Internet Sites on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: Mix tapes..
item.description: i decided to make a mix tape to night for kinnera. i looked all over, my cd collection, friends, internet and came across a few hundred “good” songs, and a couple of rather cool mix tape sites(here and here). So i finally(yea right) decided on a good selection. i hope to burn it soon. I love mix tapes. i thought about a mix tape algorithm but i decided against it :)
